biotools.summary: Prediction and Consequences of Cofragmentation in Metaproteomics | cobia is a computational tool to predict the number of cofragmenting ions in a mass spectrometry experiment, focused on metaproteomics. Specifically, we calculate 'cofragmentation scores' which represent identification and quantification bias using mass spectrometry based metaproteomics

bioschemas.name: cobia
